LanguageData.Chicken.label: kylling
LanguageData.Chicken.description: Den mest traditionelle gård fugl, er kyllingen der opdrættes for sine æg og sit kød.
LanguageData.Chicken_Meat.label: kyllingekød
LanguageData.Chicken_Corpse.label: kyllinge lig
LanguageData.Pig.label: gris
LanguageData.Pig.description: The pig was one of the first animals domesticated by humans. It is commonly raised for meat and leather, and is easy to feed because of its omnivorous diet.
LanguageData.Pig_Leather.label: griseskin
LanguageData.Pig_Meat.label: svinekød
LanguageData.Pig_Corpse.label: grise lig
LanguageData.Cow.label: ko
LanguageData.Cow.description: Et meget almindeligt gårdyr. Det kan producere store mængder af mælk, eller slagtes for lækker mad.
LanguageData.Cow_Leather.label: koskin
LanguageData.Cow_Meat.label: bøfkød
LanguageData.Cow_Corpse.label: ko lig
LanguageData.Alpaca.label: alpaka
LanguageData.Alpaca.description: A medium-sized ungulate closely related to the llama, the alpaca is often farmed for its remarkably soft wool.
LanguageData.Alpaca_Leather.label: alpakaskin
LanguageData.Alpaca_Meat.label: alpakakød
LanguageData.Alpaca_Corpse.label: alpaka lig
